Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to employee or prospective employee testing for the presence of tetrahydrocannabinols or marihuana as a condition of employment
Summary: Relates to employee or prospective employee testing for the presence of tetrahydrocannabinols or marihuana as a condition of employment.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to employee or prospective employee testing for the presence of tetrahydrocannabinols or marihuana as a condition of employment
